content.rendered:
Scuba Diving & Snorkeling

Come and join the excitement with our diving team!

Tripadvisor 5X HALL OF FAME WINNER

WHY DIVE WITH US?

Every day we schedule 2 morning boat dives (at 9.00 and 11.00), 2 in the afternoon (at 1.00 and 2.30), and night dives, when requested. We ask that you arrive at the shop 30 minutes beforehand to arrange paperwork and equipment as necessary, as well as attend a quick briefing. All of our dives are guided by a PADI professional who knows the sites and where to find the good stuff! If you would like to do a number of dives with us, why not purchase a package? The larger the package, the less you pay per dive. Our packages range from 4 dives to 10, and can include excursions like our trip to Du Du Caverns. You can do up to 4 dives a day, however you will probably choose to spread out your package over a few days or a week!

Environment

The average water temperature of Sosua Bay is 25-29°C / 76-82°F; our divers usually wear shorties though many choose to go without! We are also blessed with beautiful visibility, averaging 15-30 m (50-100 ft.) depending on environmental conditions. And for those who are not staying in Sosua, don’t worry! We are close to Cabarete, not too far from Amber Cove cruise port, Maimon, Cofresi, Costambar and Puerto Plata.

25-29°C / 76-82°F

Water Temperature

15-30m / 50-100ft.

Beautiful Visibility

14+

Dive Locations

Northern Coast Diving

Pedro Clisante 8,
Sosúa 57000

Monday to Friday: 8am - 6pm
Saturday: 8am - 6pm
Sunday: 8am - 6pm

Call Us Email Us

Certified PADI Instructors

All our activities are guided by PADI professionals, and we teach diving courses from beginner to instructor level. Our staff can speak English, Spanish and Italian, and we pride ourselves on delivering 5 star service that keeps our customers coming back to Northern Coast again and again.

View All Tours

PADI

PADI instruction is the leading method of learning, practicing, and teaching scuba diving in the world. We can arrange a course based around your schedule, and you can even do your theory before you arrive with PADI’s eLearning!* Northern Coast Diving’s professional team teaches PADI courses in English, Spanish and Italian.

View All Courses

SIT BACK AND ENJOY!!

Northern Coast Diving offer 5 star valet service.Our Team will get all the gear aboard so you can enjoy your vacation while we handle the heavy lifting.

View All Tours

PADI Certification

Learn More
